Reviews.Title: I'm starting to like this company!
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Pence
Reviews.Content: In August of 2013 I was looking for a 7" tablet at Walmart. I came across this brand. I never heard of it before. I did a lot of research and comparison shopping before I settled on the Hisense Sero Pro 7. The specs on this model were as good or better than other brands. I took a chance and bought the Hisense. So, when it came time to buy a new tv it was a no brainer. I've had it for a week now and it is of the same quality as the tablet. Looking for a tv ? In my opinion you can't go wrong with the Hisense for quality and value!

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Gregory Williams
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my Hisense 32in. Great picture quality and excellent sound. Next time I am looking for another set, it would be hard to find a better set at such a great price. Thoroughly satisfied.

Reviews.Title: nice TV for little money!
Reviews.Author: Dora Alexander
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the TV. I would recommend it to friends etc. I would definitely buy it again in the future!

Reviews.Title: outstanding!!!
Reviews.Author: teria d. williams
Reviews.Content: To anyone looking for a great tv at a great price, look no further. Ive owned this model since oct 2013.Hadnt heard of this name brand, but i must say that I am overjoyed with the pruchase. GREAT picture, decent sound, you might want to get a sound bar. great price, great product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Oruganti
Reviews.Content: For the extra bedroom. Good picture quality at a very reasonable price. Had it for more than a week and no problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Hisense 32A320 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ramonas Parrots
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good TV for my PS3 so I could play my Skyrim video game, I can actually read the signs on the game when my character is running down the roads on the game! Fantastic compared to the last 32" TV I bought last year that blew a fuse within the 90 days. I am watching this Netlix show and I am just amazed with the clarity. Great gaming, Netflix, Youtube viewing and...the sound is great for a small bedroom (I'm on a lower setting for the room 14 level and it's not even a quarter up the volume level). Good stuff, thank you LG for helping me get my video game action on during my school break and yes, when I play video games it's all for research :)...

ProductInfo.Features:
720p HDTV: Full High Definition Picture Quality, 39" Class (39" viewable)
60Hz Refresh Rate: Good for everyday viewing
HDMIx2, Composite, Component, USB, Digital Audio and Headphone Output
ProductInfo.Name: Hisense 39A320 39-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
